when will I get my refund

Refund processing times can vary depending on the payment method and your bank or credit card provider. Typically, once a refund is issued, it can take anywhere from 3 to 10 business days to appear in your account. 

If you haven't already, I recommend contacting our customer service team to confirm that your refund has been processed. They can provide you with more specific information regarding the status of your refund. If there's anything else you need, feel free to ask!
where will the money be refunded

Refunds are usually processed back to the original payment method used when you placed your order. If you paid by credit or debit card, the refund will typically be credited back to that card. If you used a digital payment method like PayPal, the refund would go back to your PayPal account.

If you used cash or another payment method, please contact our customer service team for guidance on how the refund will be processed. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
